name: Infinite Alpha [v. 0.0.0.3]
description: This is just another game in very early access. Probably sometimes I will add new content, but I can't guarantee. You may ask me "What will I get if I download it?", now it is just early access and the amount of content is close to zero, but you can subscribe and wait. Someday I hope content will appear, it would be fine  if it happened without my participation, I will make good money, you will get a game with quality content and we will both be happy.
